name: Witmer Group
overview:
Witmer Group prepares Social Marketing Strategies that are linked to tactical execution efforts which support revenue driving initiatives for its clients.

Witmer Group creates Marketing Strategy. We assist companies with social marketing strategy to include social media planning and execution, content optimization, video production and web development. We are based in Dallas, TX and specialize in search engine marketing programs, SEO, pay per click, brand development and discovery, marketing strategy, web design and holistic approaches to reach and energize your audience.

We specialize in thoughtful analysis of you current social marketing position relevant to where you want to be in the marketplace. Our programs integrate social media marketing, digital and technology solutions. We believe in teamwork combined with open dialogue, transparency and a proven execution process to create the perfect social marketing strategy.

milestones.description: Witmer Group re-brands current job optimization solution as Speed to Hire!
